items.title: Casebook on AI and Gender Empowerment Launched at India AI Impact Summit 2026
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau Ministry of Electronics & IT Casebook on AI and Gender Empowerment Launched at India AI Impact Summit 2026 Joint Initiative of MeitY and UN Women, supported by MoWCD, showcases Gender-Responsive AI Solutions from the Global South Posted On: 27 FEB 2026 9:32AM by PIB Delhi The Casebook on AI and Gender Empowerment was officially launched at the India AI Impact Summit 2026 on 17thâ€¦
